headline.main: SUMMER LETTERS.; Letter-Links between New-York and Virginia. NUMBER NINE. A Week at the Hot Springs. SARATOGA. Reveries In the Saloons of Saratoga-No. VIII SUMMER LETTERS. The Happy Valley-A Few Days Later.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is by no means usual in this world for warm and hot to be five miles apart, but it is nevertheless true in the case of these Springs. Persons resort to the Warm Springs for the luxury of bathing, as well as to imbibe the virtues of the medicinal waters. Says one, It is the greatest enjoyment in the world."

byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

docs.lead_paragraph: Antioch College is situated at Yellow Springs, Greene County, Ohio, on a railroad connecting Cincinnati and Sandusky. The Institution was incorporated in 1852.
docs.snippet: Antioch College is situated at Yellow Springs, Greene County, Ohio, on a railroad connecting Cincinnati and Sandusky. The Institution was incorporated in 1852.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Row.--About 6 1/2 o'clock, on Sunday evening, a party of rowdies went into a German porter-house in Marshall-street, near Ewen, and after drinking several times, asked for more, which was refused them. They then went into the street, and commenced stoning the house. Three Germans who were inside, becoming alarmed, ran out, and were received with a volley of stones.

headline.main: SIXTEEN DAYS LATER FROM CALIFORNIA; MINING NEWS FAVORABLE. LATER FROM TAHITI, OREGON, &C. COMMERCIAL INTELLICENCE. Marriages, Deaths, &c. CALIFORNIA. Miscellaneous. The Mines. WASHINGTON TERRITORY. OREGON. COMMERCIAL INTELLIGENCE. San Francisco Market. Arrival of the Star of the West. Financial Review. Marriages, Births and Deaths. MARRIED. BIRTHS. DIED.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Star of the West, Capt. E. L. TINKLEPAUGH, arrived at 10 o'clock yesterday, in 7 days 19 hours from San Juan del Norte, with 453 passengers and $537,337 in gold dust on freight and $500,000 in the hands efpassengers. She brings San Francisco dates per Pacific steamship Brother Jonathan, to 3 o'clock P. M. of 16th ult.

headline.main: Later from the Sandwich Islands, Australia and China.; SANDWICH ISLANDS. SOCIETY ISLANDS. AUSTRALIA. FROM CHINA.

docs.lead_paragraph: The news is one month later than by our preceding arrivals. Advices were received to the 11th of June. The Polynesian says the amount of drafts drawn by ships belonging to the American whaling fleet, touching at Honolulu and Lahaina during the last season up to Jan. 1, amounted to $300,000. The cost of exchange upon this large amount; was from 10 to 12 per cent.

headline.main: INTERESTING NARRATIVE.; Escape of an American from a Dutch Dungeon. History of his Expedition, Imprisonment, Escape, &c. Return of Walter M. Gibson to the United States. A TRUSTY MESSAGE.

docs.lead_paragraph: We had the pleasure, yesterday, of welcoming back to the United States, Capt. WALTER M. GIBSON, of the American schooner Flirt, after an absence of over two years, one of which has been passed in the dungeons of the Dutch Government of the Island of Java, under circumstances in the highest degree deserving the attention of the American people, and of the Administration at Washington.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Presentments by the Grand Jury. THE COUNTERFEITER EXAMINED. THAT PILE OF BRICKS. FATAL ACCIDENT IN AVENUE B. ILLNESS OF A JUDGE. THE ALDERMEN IN SESSION. BOARD OF ASSISTANTS. STEALING JEWELRY. A BOLD ROBBERY. U. S. DISTRICT COURT.

docs.lead_paragraph: Before His Honor the RECORDER.--The Medical Manslaughter Case--Charles Boemer, the alleged medical man, who on Saturday was found guilty of manslaughter, in causing the death of a woman whom he attended in child-birth, was called up for sentence, when the Recorder, after commenting in severe terms on his gross negligence and ignorance, and his barbarous treatment of the deceased, sentenced him to two years' imprisonment.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New- York Daily Timmes: What has become of all the Yankees? Have they all departed to the land of Ophir? If not, have they expended all their boasted genius of invention? One would think that some sad accident had happened to them by the appearance of the stages on a rainy day.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Legislature having at last conferred on our City the right and power to create two Parks which will bear some proportion to her wants and magnitude, it is hoped that the matter will not now be permitted to sleep, or "come tardy off." One of these sites may be made almost immediately available.

headline.main: BROOKLYN CITY.; MORTALITY. ANOTHER CAMPHENE ACCIDENT. CAMP-MEETING. SERIOUS ACCIDENT. RUN AWAY--NARROW ESCAPE. ROBBING A FERRY-HOUSE. VIOLATING CITY ORDINANCES. LOTTERY POLICY VENDOR ARRESTED. ACCIDENT. SERIOUS ACCIDENT. RESCURD FROM DROWNING.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Health officer reports 99 deaths for the week ending Aug. 6. Males, 44; Females, 55; Adults, 31; Children, 68. Diseases- Casualty, cholera morbus. congestion of the lungs, cyania, debility, drowned, scarlet fever, whooping cough, inflammation of the brain, tumor-1 each; diabates, typhus fever, inflammation of bowels, old age-2 each; dropsy in head, heart disease,
